sentences.en: A villager offered to house the sick traveler.
sentences.cn: 一位村民自愿收留这位生病的旅客.

sentences.en: Be a fellow villager so, I am the urban district, thank you!
sentences.cn: 原来是同乡呀, 我是市区的, 谢谢您!

sentences.en: But when You occupied village without belong with any faction , Old faction's villager live there continuously.
sentences.cn: 如果被无阵营的部队占领, 那么之前阵营的村民将继续在这个村庄居住.

sentences.en: Confronted by the police, he admitted the goat was stolen by him from a villager.
sentences.cn: 在民警的追问下, 青年承认山羊是刚从一户村民的羊棚里偷来的.

sentences.en: From the coast of Mazu, you can actually see the villager walking on the opposite side.
sentences.cn: 从马祖的海岸, 你其实看得见对面行走的乡亲.

sentences.en: If village wheat production is low, Villager use grain in elder's inventory for product wheat.
sentences.cn: 如果村庄小麦的产量较低, 村民会用村长库存中的谷物来获取小麦.

sentences.en: One day in 2006, one villager's houses fired, they donated money to them for re - building houses.
sentences.cn: 在2006年的一天, 一户村民的房子着火了, 他们捐款给他,帮助他重建房屋.

sentences.en: So no other villager was more highly looked upon than him in the village.
sentences.cn: 所以在村里他可是个倍受人尊敬的人.

sentences.en: Soon the villagers couldn't afford to buy food for themselves.
sentences.cn: 很快村民们就买不起吃的东西了。

sentences.en: The villager autonomy is based on the villagers'committee election.
sentences.cn: 村委会选举是村民自治的基础和核心,村委会选举总是要付出一定成本的,同时也有一定的收益.

sentences.en: The villager led the way into the forest.
The villager told me to take the left fork of the road.
sentences.cn: 村民指点我走左边的岔路.

sentences.en: There lies a small liver between the two villager.
sentences.cn: 在两个村子之间有一条小河.

sentences.en: They often visit the villager home after work.
sentences.cn: 他们下工后常到老乡家串门.

sentences.en: We helped the villager to sink a well.
sentences.cn: 我们帮助村民挖了一口井.

trans.tran_en: someone who lives in a village
